views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

Fixes for iOS LockScreen bugs!
-A "real" fix for an issue that could prevent swiping to Today View or Camera from the Lock Screen & Notification Center.
-Also fixes an issue that could prevent the virtual Home Button from invoking the Passcode view.

No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.

Added support for arm64e
Added compatibility with iOS 12.4
Now fully compatible with iOS 11 and 12
